dct_description_sm: Map surrounded by parting clouds with the title inside a banner running across the top of the page.

Issued in his: Atlas Coelestis Containing the Systems and Theoryes of the Planets and Constellations of the Starrs. -- [London] : Sold by Ben. Bragg in Pater Noster Row. Entry #507 also included in the book.
Western hemisphere shown without place names. California depicted with a long flat northern coastline. Large land mass to the west of South America.
